RequirementText: the product shall ensure that only supervisors can enter a caller s schedule the product must ensure that supervisors are allowed to access advertise empty time slots
the product shall be able to delete room equipment
when a shot is marked as a hit the product shall simulate the sound of a shot hitting its target
all actions that modify an existing dispute case must be recorded in the case history
only registered realtors shall be able to access the system
the system shall be able to automatically backup business data and restore them on demand
only administrators can activate a pre paid card
the product shall make the users want to use it 80 of the users surveyed report they are regularly using the product after the first 2 weeks post launch
the product shall provide error tracking services the product shall help the system administrators and dbas to resolve transaction errors 99 of the time
the website will comply with w3c standards
the system shall prevent malicious attacks including denial of service
the product shall record the transportation status of equipment reserved
staff members shall be able to complete a set of tasks in a timely manner
100 of merchant services representatives shall be able to successfully perform a follow up action on a dispute case on the first encounter after completing the training course
the ratings shall be from a scale of 1 10
for leads that process longer than 25 seconds the system will record the event and duration
movies shall be encoded and streamed via windows media player 9 0
the application shall ask the user to confirm dropping a player or trading a player before performing the action
the product shall create an exception log of problems encountered within the product for transmission to our company for analysis and resolution
the disputes application shall ensure that only users with the appropriate access level are allowed to initiate dispute requests
all aspects of the website shall be accessed by a web browser over the internet
the product shall adhere to the corporate architecture guidelines
the system shall refresh the display every 60 seconds
the product shall prevent the input of malicious data the product and or adjacent hardware software systems data shall remain 100 uncorrupted each time malicious data is input into the product
the website will provide a help section with answers and solutions to common problems
the system shall allow a program administrator or nursing staff member to remove a student from a clinical lab section

the disputes system shall allow the user to create or initiate a chargeback request the system must prompt the user to enter the required information to initiate a chargeback request the chargeback request results in a printed chargeback notification that is sent to merchant indicating that their account will be charged back if no proof is provided that the disputed transaction is valid

the product and or dependent databases filesystems shall remain operational as a result of the input of malicious data the product and or dependent databases filesystems shall not crash 100 of the time that malicious data is input into the product
the maintenance of the product will fall within the established corporate maintenance windows
product formulas shall allow use of semi products which have own formulas
website shall allow customers to view reviews of selected movies by other customers
the system shall interface with the faculty central server
the product shall operate in offline mode whenever internet connection is unavailable
the recycled parts audit report shall be returned to the user within 10 seconds the audit report shall be returned within 10 seconds
the disputes system must prevent external users from requesting original receipts requests for original receipts are restricted to internal users
the adjuster shall be able to override the preferred repair facitlity on the estimate assignment
all updates to data files or database must be initiated from the disputes system
system shall let izogn manager access sales and usage statistics in under 2 minutes
the system shall utilize currently owned computer equipment
website shall allow customers to browse movies by categories entered in by izogn administrator
the estimator shall search for available recycled parts using damaged vehicle parts information
the lead washing process will operate within the established physical web service structure
the leads washing functionality will have an interface in which lead data parameters can be maintained
program administrators and nursing staff members shall be able to add a single student to a cohort
the product shall be able to process 10 000 transactions per hour within two years of its launch this number will increase to 20 000 by release 2
the product shall be supported using the corporate support center
the product shall have the ability to receive automatic software updates as new threats emerge 100 of customers will be able to receive automatic software updates transmitted to the installed product
the wcs system shall not allow automatic logins by any user cookies containing wcs login information about a user will not be stored on a user s computer
the system shall be able to display a printable summary of the system log
the system shall be used within the specifications defined by the computers used by the program administrators nursing staff members
the look and feel of the system shall conform to the user interface standards of the smart device
for each turn the product shall allow the offensive player to define a shot
the estimator shall not apply recycled parts to the collision estimate if no available parts are returned
an anonymous survey will show that 70 of customers are comfortable purchasing streaming movies after 2 weeks using the website
the product shall be easy to use by adjusters and collision estimators 95 of adjusters and collision estimators shall find the product easy to use
the product must comply with sarbanes oxley
the bottom 3 4 of the table will hold events that occur according to its relevance to current time

user access should be limited to the permissions granted to their role s each level in the pcg hierarchy will be assigned a role and users will be assigned to these roles access to functionality within rfs system is dependent on the privileges permission assigned to the role
the language of the product shall accommodate all of the target market countries 90 of survey respondents from each target market country will find that the language of the product is acceptable

the disputes application shall interface with the cardmember information database the cardmember information database provides detailed information with regard to a cardmember all cardmember detail information must be obtained from the cardmember information database

the product shall have a customizable look and feel

the disputes system must provide the ability to view existing dispute cases
the disputes application must conform to the legal requirements as specified by regulation e and regulation z that govern credit card disputes processing

students added to a cohort shall be eligible for the cohort s program of study

when a ship is sunk the product shall simulate the sound of a sinking ship

the leads washing functionality will verify the users authentication and rights to make parameter updates
the product shall interface csr and datastream the product shall exchange messages between csr and eam on a real time basis without any direct interfaces between two systems

the users should be able to easily use the system to successfully complete their budgets within the stipulated time for completion with a week of training prior to product implementation 98 of the users shall complete their budgets within the stipulated time
the system shall offer the ability to pause and resume the refresh of data

for each shot the product shall mark the shot as a hit or miss on the defensive grid of the defensive player

the interface shall have a simple look in the interface and usability survey 90 of beta testers must report that the interface is adequately simple
the product shall be able to send meeting notifications via different kinds of end user specified methods
when the offensive player takes a shot the product shall simulate the sound of a ship at sea
a program of study shall consist of a program name and listing of required classes both clinical and non clinical that must be completed
the product shall assign the organizers contact information to each meeting they create
the product shall provide gui based monitoring services system administrators shall monitor message exchanges will predict and determine problems and will also provide internal and external support
the wcs system shall be run in a windows environment the wcs shall be accessed by users through the internet on an ibm computer running a windows 2000 or above operating system
program administrators and nursing staff members shall be able to add new classes for the nursing department into the system
the system shall help the user avoid making mistakes while scheduling classes and clinicals for the nursing students
the product shall comply with corporate color scheme
users shall be able to view at least 25 nfl player statistics and points on each page
when streaming a movie the buffering time should take no longer than 10 seconds plus any latency on the user s connection
the system must use a point and click interface 100 of all selection and navigation functionality must be able to be activated selected by either a mouse or a keyboard

the system shall be responsive at the depaul teleservices center when a supervisor uses the system to view a callers schedule the system response time must be no more than 2 seconds 90 of the time and no more than 5 seconds the rest of the time
the system shall display the events in a graph by time
the product shall be able support 1000 simultaneous users
the product shall have a conservative and professional appearance
the product shall be expected to operate within the maximum maintenance budget for a minimum of 2 years
when a shot is marked as a miss the product shall simulate the sound of a shot missing its target
once a game has been initiated the product shall make the players assigned to the game unavailable for selection from the list of players
all registered customer information shall be stored and maintained in the database even after the customer cancels their account
once a game is initiated the product shall allow each player to position their 5 ships on their respective defensive grids
the product shall end a game when a hit by the offensive player results in sinking the last of the defensive player s ships which had not been previously marked as sunk

the wcs system must run queries to the wcs databases once again on a specified day to update the available data available to ccr users queries must be made to external databases for data refresh once a week
movies shall be encoded for 56k and 256k streams

the user shall select to save the preferred repair facility ratings
the product shall have security the product shall provide authentication and authorization
the website shall continue to operate if the streaming server goes down
the product shall allow the player to position ships diagonally on their grid
the system shall allow entering storing and modifying product formulas
if the shot was marked as a hit the product shall allow the offensive player to define a shot

the system shall color code events according to their variance from current time

on a 112k connection or faster the system response time for all operations must be no more than 3 seconds 90 of the time
the system interface will use ccr nomenclature the system must use the same nomenclature used in the existing wcs system and reports

the user shall be able to download appointments and contact information for clients

the vehicle location shall include street address city state and zipcode

all streaming movie sales will be logged in the database and accessible by the administrator
